name: Un-nerfable. They alive dammit.
author: AwesomeTed
notes: Farted around with more fun decks before saying screw it and just using this. Balance because turns out you don't need Trunade if nobody's running backrow. Bacon Saver's actually super fun, and was always happy to see him (especially the three times decks tried to ECon take for game after obviously forgetting about him).
